column1: Little Goat Diner////It was ok. For the price
column2: I was fairly disappointed. Well over $20 for a burger and fries was kind of annoying
column3: and all I could taste on the burger was the sauce because they put way too much on. However
column5: and I'm sure they're popular mostly for other things
column6: not the burgers lol. I would recommend getting something other than the burger if you go. The corned beef hash was also thin and dry
column7: but did have a good flavor
column8: if you're fine with that style of corned beef hash.
